title: 2 bed,  2 bath -- FREE Parking, Kitchen Pantry, Extra Storage
posting_body: Welcome home to beautiful Greens of Merrill Creek Apartment Homes in Everett, Washington.
Let us help you enjoy more than 1600 acres of beautiful public parks, trails, and playgrounds and nearly 50 miles of freshwater and saltwater shoreline.
Everett is home to some of the best salmon and steelhead fishing in the world, boasting the largest public marina on the West Coast.
At Greens of Merrill Creek we offer our residents one-, two-, or three-bedroom floor plans.

Each apartment home includes a built-in computer desk, a private patio or balcony, a full pantry, a gourmet all electric kitchen, plush wall to wall carpeting, spacious walk-in closets, mini and vertical blinds and a full-size washer and dryer.

Our Residents enjoy many amenities on site such as on call and on-site maintenance, assigned parking, beautifully landscaped grounds, a business center with copy and fax services, easy access to public transportation and shopping.
